00046 void FileForm::CreateGUIControls()
00047 {
00048         //Do not add custom code between
00049         //GUI Items Creation Start and GUI Items Creation End.
00050         //wxDev-C++ designer will remove them.
00051         //Add the custom code before or after the blocks
00053 
00054         SetTitle(wxT("Add file or directory"));
00055         SetIcon(wxNullIcon);
00056         SetSize(8,8,268,126);
00057         Center();
00058         
00059 
00060         OpenDialog =  new wxFileDialog(this, wxT("Choose a file"), wxT(""), wxT(""), wxT("*.*"), wxOPEN);
00061 
00062         BtnCancel = new wxButton(this, wxID_CANCEL, wxT("Cancel"), wxPoint(195,71), wxSize(61,20), 0, wxDefaultValidator, wxT("BtnCancel"));
00063         BtnCancel->SetFont(wxFont(8, wxSWISS, wxNORMAL,wxNORMAL, false, wxT("Tahoma")));
00064 
00065         btnOK = new wxButton(this, wxID_OK, wxT("OK"), wxPoint(123,72), wxSize(61,20), 0, wxDefaultValidator, wxT("btnOK"));
00066         btnOK->SetFont(wxFont(8, wxSWISS, wxNORMAL,wxNORMAL, false, wxT("Tahoma")));
00067 
00068         wxArrayString arrayStringFor_edDest;
00069         arrayStringFor_edDest.Add(wxT("<app>\\"));
00070         arrayStringFor_edDest.Add(wxT("<src>\\"));
00071         arrayStringFor_edDest.Add(wxT("<win>\\"));
00072         arrayStringFor_edDest.Add(wxT("<sys>\\"));
00073         edDest = new wxComboBox(this, ID_EDDEST, wxT("<app>\\"), wxPoint(6,45), wxSize(250,21), arrayStringFor_edDest, 0, wxDefaultValidator, wxT("edDest"));
00074         edDest->SetFont(wxFont(8, wxSWISS, wxNORMAL,wxNORMAL, false, wxT("Tahoma")));
00075 
00076         lblDest = new wxStaticText(this, ID_LBLDEST, wxT("Destination (if destination is a directory, put a \\ at the end)"), wxPoint(6,25), wxDefaultSize, 0, wxT("lblDest"));
00077         lblDest->SetFont(wxFont(8, wxSWISS, wxNORMAL,wxNORMAL, false, wxT("Tahoma")));
00078 
00079         wxBitmap btnLoad_BITMAP (FileForm_btnLoad_XPM);
00080         btnLoad = new wxBitmapButton(this, ID_BTNLOAD, btnLoad_BITMAP, wxPoint(240,6), wxSize(16,16), wxBU_AUTODRAW, wxDefaultValidator, wxT("btnLoad"));
00081         btnLoad->SetFont(wxFont(8, wxSWISS, wxNORMAL,wxNORMAL, false, wxT("Tahoma")));
00082 
00083         edSource = new wxTextCtrl(this, ID_EDSOURCE, wxT(""), wxPoint(46,7), wxSize(189,16), 0, wxDefaultValidator, wxT("edSource"));
00084         edSource->SetFont(wxFont(8, wxSWISS, wxNORMAL,wxNORMAL, false, wxT("Tahoma")));
00085

00096 void FileForm::SetMode(bool d)
00097 {
00098     Dir = d;
00099     if(Dir)
00100         SetTitle(wxT("Add Directory"));
00101     else
00102         SetTitle(wxT("Add File"));
00103 }

00108 void FileForm::btnLoadClick(wxCommandEvent& event)
00109 {
00110         // insert your code here
00111         static wxString DirectoryString = wxPathOnly(FileName); //Set directory string to root of the DevPackage
00112         // insert your code here
00113         wxString s;
00114         
00115         if(Dir)
00116         {
00117         wxDirDialog TempDirDlg(this,wxT("Select Directory"),DirectoryString);
00118         if(TempDirDlg.ShowModal() == wxID_OK)
00119         {
00120                 //wxFileName TempFileName(TempDirDlg.GetPath());
00121                 //TempFileName.MakeRelativeTo(wxPathOnly(wxTheApp->argv[0]));
00122             //edSource->SetValue(TempFileName.GetFullPath());
00123             edSource->SetValue(TempDirDlg.GetPath());
00124             DirectoryString = TempDirDlg.GetPath();
00125         }
00126     }
00127     else
00128     {
00129         OpenDialog->SetPath(wxPathOnly(wxTheApp->argv[0]));//app path
00130         if(OpenDialog->ShowModal() == wxID_OK)
00131         {
00132                //wxFileName TempFileName(OpenDialog->GetPath());
00133                //TempFileName.MakeRelativeTo(wxPathOnly(wxTheApp->argv[0]));
00134                //edSource->SetValue(TempFileName.GetFullPath());
00135                edSource->SetValue(OpenDialog->GetPath());
00136         }
00137     }
00138 }
